Code For Selected Patterns
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
{File:USO_IS.txt  Index:4  Index Date:20171130  PL:83.33%  PS:16.67%  Trades:18  CL:1}

IF CLOSE OF 7 BARS AGO > CLOSE OF 8 BARS AGO
AND CLOSE OF 8 BARS AGO > CLOSE OF 6 BARS AGO
AND CLOSE OF 6 BARS AGO > CLOSE OF 5 BARS AGO
AND CLOSE OF 5 BARS AGO > CLOSE OF 3 BARS AGO
AND CLOSE OF 3 BARS AGO > CLOSE OF 4 DAYS AGO
THEN BUY NEXT BAR ON THE OPEN WITH
PROFIT TARGET AT ENTRY PRICE + 2.158308 %
AND STOP LOSS AT ENTRY PRICE - 2.757766 %
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
